name: PULSIA
description:
WARNING: CONTAINS SOME FLASHING LIGHTS

A unique rhythm game experience.

HOW TO PLAY:
  • Use WASD or arrow keys to move to different parts of the grid
  • When a circle appears, move to it on the beat when it turns green
  • Note: Once you hit a note, don't move until the next one is ready - being on the note too early will count as a miss.

Also note: video, input, and sound could be out of sync or offset on some devices. I was unfortunately not able to add a way to adjust offset.

The following music was used for this media project:

Music: Cry by Sascha Ende

Free download: https://filmmusic.io/song/10346-cry
